website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable eyewear retainer that has a simple design with a soft cotton knit cover.
pros: Can fully tighten the eyewear retainer by just sliding the bead in the back
Surgical tubing ends covered in cotton knit slide over the ear pieces on the glasses
Great price point for this type of product
cons: May not fit over the ear pieces of some glasses
Fabric may tear if overly stretched

customer_reviews.title: I cannot live without these!
customer_reviews.text: I am a dental hygienist and spend most of my day looking down into someone's mouth. It's hot and sweaty work even with air conditioning. I've had to apologize for my eyeglasses sliding off my face and nearly hitting a patient more times than I'd like to admit. These completely solved the problem! They are soft and comfortable behind my ears even while also having a mask stretched around them. I absolutely love them and I can't work without them. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the original style Ray Ban Wayfarers great!
customer_reviews.text: I have the original Ray Ban 2140 Wayfarers and these fit just fine. Like others have said, they are very tight going on but with a little extra effort and patience they actually fit better than the large version. I now have Black Lrg., EV Blue Lrg. And this EV Green Orig. If you have wayfarer sunglasses go with the original size and thanks to the other reviewers who said they would fit because they do and they are thinner behind the ear on the earpiece than the large version. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: My Glasses Will NEVER Go Bare Again!!
customer_reviews.text: Chums have saved my glasses more times than I can count. I love being able to just pop my glasses off my head and let them hang on my neck when I am riding, running, climbing, slacking, or anything outside. Using Chums has saved me from losing my expensive pairs of glasses over the years. Seriously, it is much easier to keep track of your glasses when they have a leash attached to them. See, you CAN have nice things!
customer_reviews.author: Joel S

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to use. Dark Purple color has heavy brown undertones - great neutral color without being boring black. Put these on my Maui Jim Red Sands Sunglasses. The ends are a bit wider than most sunglass frames. These slid on easily and stayed put, even with frequent use and pulling. When I took this off my sunglasses, it pulled the rubber comfort pads on the ear section out of their housing a bit. I was able to push the pads back into the grooves, so no permanent damage done. But with repeated on/off, it might eventually tear or disfigure the rubber enough to ruin them.
customer_reviews.author: Cory B

customer_reviews.title: Fits my RayBan New Wayfarers
customer_reviews.text: These Chums fit my New Wayfarers just fine. They require some patience slowly shimmying along the arms. Take your time. You could always use some hair spray to smooth things along and creates a tacky surface when dry. Very comfy and the extra padding soaks some sweat and help keep them on my face. Very secure.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very functional! The ends that slide onto your sunglasses are very tight and secure and the fabric used is very comfortable and lightweight. There is a bead to secure the strap a bit tighter if you need to. All around, this will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I like Chums more than any other eyewear retainer. Some of them have a stiff cord that sticks into my neck and is uncomfortable, or rubberized sliders that pull my hair out. These are made of soft fabric so they are flexible and don't poke the back of your neck. The slider is a simple bead but it doesn't pull out hair (you want to adjust it before you put it on if you have long hair) and stays where you put it. I use it for skiing and climbing and my sunglasses stay on without sliding forward. I bought 2 pair!
customer_reviews.author: kolo:wisi

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am having to wear a face shield for my work. Unfortunately the style that I am required to wear has plastic eyeglass style frames. The plastic frames were rubbing against my ears causing discomfort throughout my shift. I ordered these cotton retainers and they fit perfect. No uncomfortable rubbing against the ears. Even better, they work well to keep control sweat. Easy to clean, just wash in cold water and air dry. No slipping off. I will probably order another pair for my sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I have always wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products that promise to keep my glasses on my face that I was skeptical of this one. I just got it in today, and I am happy to say that it works so far. If it loosens up over time I will come back and report (and reduce my rating). The one thing I do find a bit annoying is that it is not snug enough on wire frames. My plastic frames are all fine, but the wire frames are too skinny. I will see if I can remedy this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Roche

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the best and originals
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the originals! I live in Hawaii and wear shades all the time (even while sleeping...sometimes the sun in my dreams can be intense) so I like to have my RayBans handy at all times. If I put them in my shirt pocket or hang them from the button on the shirt, they will always fall. So I learned to use Chums, and they haven't failed me yet. My previous pair lasted a few years, but the salt water and high UV rays here are through them pretty harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC, everything I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I live in Phoenix- even doing my walk in the morning (before/at sunrise) and despite it being dry- SWEAT. I'm not sure why I hadn't tried these, yet (as my shades were sliding down 15, 20 times at LEAST), though I knew of the item... SO glad I bought these. Made HERE, made QUALITY and they fit so well. I go 6'2" 195-200 with a big frame/head and they were so easy to adjust. And when I put them tight, man they STAYED it!! (to the point the first day I had to learn to lighten it, my face literally felt pulled I had em on so tight, lol). AWESOME- so glad I went with Chums, ty!
customer_reviews.author: AZWarmer

customer_reviews.title: My sunglasses are secure
customer_reviews.text: I work at the airport and have lost quite a few pair of sunglasses. I use to hang them on my shirt or on my head and when I go back to put them on.... GONE. Now I got a pair of Ray-Ban New Wayfarers and they are secure with these Chums. It did take me a lil bit of time to get them on my sunglasses, but the effort is well worth it. Recommended A+
customer_reviews.author: Patty in Orange County

customer_reviews.title: Same Original Chums
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Original Chums about 20+ years. They work great on my reading & sunglasses. Lite weight and will last me 1-2years I have 2 different sets of reading glasses-last minimum 2 years, my sunglasses less time due to exposure to more sun and saltwater Boat Environment. Received product in 1.5 days from order. Awesome Turnaround time and Product/Seller IMO
customer_reviews.author: JImmie Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and bead adjustment works great
customer_reviews.text: This eyeglass retainer is comfortable, lightweight and easy to adjust with the bead. I can lengthen the retainer strap, attach it to my glasses, slip it on, then tighten to fit my head. It works great around my ears even when I wear my mask, and it doesn't get tangled in my long hair either. The retainer arrived on time, and was just what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is a life changing product for me. I’ve worn glasses for years but I’ve always had trouble with exercise causing them to slip down my nose. This is really annoying with cycling, running, hiking, etc. I had to always choose between constantly pushing up my glasses or trying to go on a run without them. With this strap, once tightened, no amount of movement or perspiration cause my glasses to move AT ALL. They look pretty funny and I wouldn’t wear them as a fashion accessory, but perfect for their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Very secure on my glasses and it’s easy to tighten and loosen, but a few cons. 1- my hair always gets caught in it when I tighten, even though my hair is in a pony tail. 2- I purchased a black one and it got super discolored in less than a year. Looks brown now. 3- it is very hard to get on Ray Ban glasses. I did it with a lot of fiddling but it’s a little too tight for glasses with wider ear things (what are the sides of glasses called anyway???).
customer_reviews.author: SDubGold

customer_reviews.title: These are cheaper than a new pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My ability to lose a pair of sunglasses seems directly related to how expensive they are. I can hang on to a cheap pair of gas station sunglasses for years, but the first time I wear a pair of Oakleys or Bolle is usually the last as they will jump off my head and drown themselves, or wander off on the job and not come home with me. I figure these Chums are cheaper than having to buy a new pair of sunglasses and so far have done the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Oryx

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I wear glasses and always struggle to keep them in place during workouts when my face gets sweaty. Sometimes I need to remove them, which can be dangerous as I'm basically blind. I bought these Chums and don't even notice my glasses anymore! They stay in place and I don't need to do my burpees or pushups without them 😀! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! The jellyfish is almost a peachy orange. They took a second to slide on my Rayban Wayfares (had to twist a little as I slid them on). They are so sturdy and look great. I already bought a pair for my bf and my mom (arriving today and tomorrow). I am already shopping for another pair for my backup sunnies. Not sure what took me so long to purchase these. Also- I don't have experience with other brands of eyewear retainer but Sunglass hut employee said Chums are the only brand to consider (not the brand they carry). A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and keeps glasses secure
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Chums cotton retainer. I've tried some other brands and many have a big hard plastic piece that connects to the glasses - these tend to get in my way. I slide the Chums up on the frames a bit and they provide a nice cushion against my ears. The drawstring keeps the glasses in place if I'm being active and can easily be loosened to let my glasses hang if I don't need them. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like an old Chum
customer_reviews.text: Chums has been in the eye wear business for at least 30 years, there is a reason they've been around for so long. These eyewear retainers are soft to the touch and after a while you have no idea they are even there. These are well constructed and last for years. I currently have chums on a couple sets of Oakley's and one set of Costa Del Mars. If you spend any time around water like me, one set of chums can save you from losing your expensive glasses into a lake or river. They are well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome made in USA product .
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying these use to get lots these free were i worked of this same style and brand they work and last a very long time I simply throw them in the wash with the cloths when they need washed and after 2 yrs avg just throw them away ..these are great I had tried other brands but they just weren't same quality as this brand these are simply awesome plus made in USA in Utah..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great retainer
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time with my reading glasses. The retainer is super handy, looks good, is lightweight, and keeps reading glasses on the face or right within reach, depending on whether they're being worn or hanging from the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Bearwife

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits tightly on the ear pieces and the adjustment ball has just the right amount of tension to hold my readers close to my eyes when I'm looking down and doing close-in work. Now, for example,when working on my car in the garage where its warm and I begin to sweat, the specs stay put where I need them instead of sliding down my nose which would drive me crazy. Aaahh...a pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Chums brand, work great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a pair of Chums eyewear retainer before, have used several other brands for holding glasses for various sports activities, some worked better than others depending on activity. Needed something washable that was adjustable and held glasses in place doing ocean outrigger paddling. Decided on the Chums and they work great. Stay secure, very comfortable, very adjustable, easy on off with wire frame glasses/sunglasses for cleaning. Will see how it holds up to salt water but, will probably purchase several others to have a clean one always one available. Aloha!!
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these about 10 times and they held my glasses on securely. I haven't fallen out of a boat or dunked my head underwater but I have no doubt these would keep my glasses on my face. It's comfortable enough I have forgotten to take the retainer off my glasses until I am ready to remove them before bed. I wear a boonie hat when I am out on the water and haven't had any issues with tangled straps which was initially a concern.
customer_reviews.author: J t

customer_reviews.title: Practical eye-glass wrap
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping your eye-glasses on while doing active work. My husband had a pair he used for many years for yard work and found the same model here. It's machine-washable and I just hang it in the window to dry. I bought him a second pair for our up-coming trip. Also wanted to add this style fits larger eye-glasses and sun-glasses styles with thicker sides. Probably not suitable for thinner pairs.
customer_reviews.author: noelani

customer_reviews.title: Fits Ray Ban Wayfarer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after reading several reviews that said they would fit over the large Ray Ban wayfarer sunglass style and they did not disappoint. This was exactly what I was looking for and it easily fits over the tips of the sunglasses. I purchased black and the color has faded a bit from being in the pool/water but from a functional stand point they worked as advertised. I would buy again. I wear the Ray Ban RB2132.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not made like before.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not made like they were 30 years ago as things go with them being thinner and not as thick as they used they used to be. Maybe for comfort reasons or cost but they still work and my boy loves them especially after losing a new pair of shades the same day we bought them. There still good and they work just with the quality didn’t go down.
customer_reviews.author: OpporTUNAty Sportfishing

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for almost 2 years. I got tired of my sunglasses sliding down my nose while jogging/running. I tried one other product before this one and it pulled and ripped out a lot of hair. These are soft, and as long as your careful when you slide the bead to tighten or loosen, you won't pull any hair out. I wash them and let them hang dry. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MrsGoe

customer_reviews.title: mother in-law loved
customer_reviews.text: my mother-in law needed these cause the ones she has been buying, keep knocking her hearing aid out of her ear when she puts on or takes off her glasses. but these are very nice she dose not have to worry about the hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, helps hold safety glasses in place
customer_reviews.text: Wow, we have went thru many eyewear retainers and been disappointed. These are GREAT!! They fit over the thicker end of safety glasses (which is usually hard or impossible to do) and they hold the glasses in place very well. Super comfortable and appear to be well made. Very pleased with purchase and will definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: mca

customer_reviews.title: Get chummy with yer new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: These have seemed to waned over the years in use though I still love them and use them on all my glasses as I'm 57 and forget where I put stuff so I can hang these on a door knob and find my em' anytime I need to! well-made fits a myriad of sizes I got the royal blue as it's a gorgeous color that matches my mirrored aviators and safe and secure vendor. Would definitely recommend though the only caveat is the colors will fade if you use them in the washing machine. Manufacturer recommends handwashing only.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis lovr

customer_reviews.title: NOT for big frames, very very tight fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The part that slides over the glasses is VERY tight, too tight to work on my wife's glasses for which this was meant for. They fit on mine, and although they do hold my glasses on my face, having a long tail of strap is highly irritating because it gets caught on things and almost any movement of it changes the position of my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the securing of my safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my safety glasses. They slid onto the earpieces just fine and there appears to be some material inside the ends of the chum’s that aid in the securing to the eyeglass earpiece. The adjust let’s me tighten them to my head shape while holding the eyeglasses close to my face . I would but these again !
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be uncomfortable with some sunglasses i own.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT QUALITY feeling product. Only thing i noticed was if i slip the product all the way onto my sunglass arms... the thickness of the product over my ears becomes irrirating & uncomfortable (especially if im wearing a hat). Simple solution was to only slide the product about a little less than a quarter inch onto my sunglasses arms in order for them to not reach the top of my ears and still hold on tight to my glasses. Works for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: holes too small
customer_reviews.text: the holes designed to insert eye glass temples is far too small for sport glasses. If you use wire frame it would work fine. and from the seller I purchased returns were not allowed.
customer_reviews.author: WTC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! We bought these when I couldn’t find Croakies at their regular price. I read the reviews and thought these could be a suitable replacement to the Croakies he loves...but decision. My husband has had these for 7 weeks and they are so faded that they no longer look black and look more like a purple, plus the fabric is pilling!
customer_reviews.author: mgrightmyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit all glasses, but when they do, they work!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on a pair of glasses and couldn't get the rubber over top of the ends of my thick ended glasses. However, they work great on thin ended glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Félix

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: DOES NOT FIT RAYBAN WAYFARERS!
customer_reviews.text: Long ago, I owned some Chums, and remember liking them. After reading the description of this model that included “fits most standard frames” and the Q & A in which someone said they fit Rayban Wayfarers, I ordered a pair. They absolutely DO NOT fit Rayban Wayfarers, and that should be explicitly stated in the description of their “standard end model” eyewear retainer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and soft cotton.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot i use them on my Maui Jim's red sands. The cotton is soft. The only thing I don't like about them is that they'll get caught sometimes on my shirt collar(polo, button up) and it'll pull the glasses on my face if I turne my head. Not a huge deal and I suppose any brand would do this. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep glasses from slipping during work. Prevents touching your face/glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Although the neoprene ones are more secure and best for water sports, these are best for walking and being in a full face shield and mask at work so I don't have to worry about my glasses slipping down on me. You can't touch your face &have to disinfect before and after removing the gear (and having the problem occur again).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually Saved Me Money!
customer_reviews.text: My kid wore his prescription glasses canoeing. He fell in and the glasses fell off his face, but were dangling around his chest thanks to these! So comfortable wearing you barely notice them. Easy to attach to glasses and tighten on head. Such a simple device but so cool. I really love all of the Chums branded products I own and this is no different. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, My Error in Design Needed
customer_reviews.text: Be careful want you want. I realized I really wanted my old style croakies - just something to keep my glasses on at the gym. These are more for keeping glasses around your neck as you take them on and off. I ended up cutting them and sewing the ends together to make them look and use as croakies. Just be careful. Quality is there, just I picked the wrong design.
customer_reviews.author: BDG

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy stream fishing but have been leary of using my expensive prescription sunglasses in the water. I decided to give these Chums a try and am glad I did. They hold my glasses securely and the cloth is comfortable on my neck. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk M

customer_reviews.title: Chums don't break
customer_reviews.text: These Chums are great! I was using Croakies for almost a year, but their plastic attachments kept breaking - probably 40 of them in like 9 months. The first time they broke, Croakies sent me a free pair, but then I had to keep ordering them like every two weeks. I wasn't surfing or doing anything crazy with them, just going to work and normal daily activity. Finally I got sick of their unreliance and looked for a reliable switch. These Chums have no plastic attachments, so nothing to break - they just pop on the glasses ends very easy, and mine haven't had any problems like slipping off or anything. Very highly recommended. #CHUMSFORTHEWIN
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It does the job but...
customer_reviews.text: ...the "fabric" looks and feels cheap. It twists and turns after a day of use and looks like a jumbled mess. The only reason this deserves 3 stars is, what can you expect for this price? This went in the trash and I forked up the extra money for a nicer rope style.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Made in "Our Homeland, The United States of America",
customer_reviews.text: Made in "Our Homeland, The United States of America", UTAH. I have been purchasing Chums eyewear retainers, since they were established in 1983, and have always been very pleased. The quality has remained the same, over the last 35 years, proving that Americans do it correctly the first time and never cut corners. Hat's off to Chums, for their enduring commitment and providing a fine product showing US pride.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Chums on the market
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Chums for a trip to Thailand. I had the skinnier Chums with two loops that go around your glasses but lost them. I decided to try these. On a fashion note, and a practicality note, I'd stick to the thinner cord version of the chums. They are more camouflaged into your outfits and easier to take off if needed. These cotton Chums were very difficult to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Yvee22

customer_reviews.title: Good to wear with a mask
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Grips onto glasses well, and holds even better. Kinda tough getting it on at first but once its in, you can tell that this is a quality product worth every cent. Wearing a mask now has been making my glasses slip constantly. Adding these to my glasses has kept them safely attatched to my face. I'm pretty sure I could skydive with this and they'd stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality holders for sunglasses. The ends are flexible and it's very easy to install the glasses, no matter the specific size or shape of the end pieces. They hold the end pieces securely, so I never worry about them slipping out. Plus they are comfortable and washable, which is good if you use them for running, swimming, or anything else that involves a lot of moving and sweating, etc. I already have one, but I love these and wanted a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Megadoodoo

customer_reviews.title: These retainers does not fit my  Costa Del Mar Tuna Alley sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I got this products in high hopes that it will work for my Costa Del Mar sunglasses but only to find that these retainers only fit the basic sunglasses or eyeglasses nothing more than that.
customer_reviews.author: KOKOMO

customer_reviews.title: They do what they are supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I lost a pair of $500 Ray Ban sunglasses in the lake so I thought I needed some loss protection when I replaced them. These chums are pretty difficult to attach to the arms of the Ray Bans but that only means that once they are on they are not going to come off. I hardly notice wearing them and I know that I will not lose another pair of expensive sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Wachtel

customer_reviews.title: Great for...everything!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that has not been said already? These are lightweight, comfortable, and, most importantly, they keep your glasses secure. I purchased these for a trip to Mexico where we were swimming in the ocean, snorkeling, on a boat, riding ATVs, hiking, and eating...so much eating. These glasses retainers held up to it all. I got the light blue, which I would describe as a cornflower blue. Very pretty - subtle, but a little pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: EMM

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: This "eyewear retainer" works fine. If you have issues with the elastic type of retainer, try one of these. The material is quite soft and will not irritate in any way, plus the adjust-ability insures your eye wear will stay where you want them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: If you ain’t sportin’ Chums..... you’re a chump!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Chums since I was a 10 year old grom with a Rat board and turquoise & pink wetsuit. They hold great, look awesome and provide the security needed to protect my gas station shades. Buy a pair and open up your lifestyle to more aggressive sports without the worry of your specs flying off your face
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Powell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this product and put it on my sunglasses, they felt awkward and uncomfortable. After a day of wearing them though, I got used to the feeling of the band behind my ears and back of my neck. It holds the glasses securely, comfortable enough, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: joebus

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT STAY ON SUNGLASSES
customer_reviews.text: WARNING ! WON'T Stay on glasses. These will pull off of your glasses. My $160.00 Maui Jim's hit the floor because these lanyards slipped off of the frames ! Luckily, they fell on a carpeted area in my home, otherwise they would have been ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Jim_OBX

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely wore out my last Chums retainer. This time I ordered 2, to have an extra. I wear them on Rayban Predators and have no issues with fit. Very comfortable, and will save your glasses from going overboard in the boat. Trust me on that...
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and do their job
customer_reviews.text: What more can you say. I think the design of these are great. Keep your glasses around your neck when you don't need them on or just have some security when you are out on the water. I think they feel great and keep your glasses secure. This is not my first Chums. They've been around for a while.
customer_reviews.author: jland

customer_reviews.title: still have my glasses, they're not going anywhere! good material, too
customer_reviews.text: does what it's supposed to do. keep it from falling off my head. another benefit (for me, at least) is that I bought glasses a little too big for my head. by using these, it not only keeps it on but keeps it snug too bought these specifically for disney world so that my sunglasses wouldn't fall off while on the rollercoasters. lost a pair before BUT NOT THIS TIME BABY! material is sort of thick but that's based on your preference. definitely feels like it's going to last me a while. no signs of it giving up after using them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This croakie is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a few croakies over the years, but this is easily the best I have found. I have difficult Ray Ban Wayfarer sunglasses that have widely flared tips. This is the only croakie that I found that not only fits, but stays in place while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chums. The original one I had for my loupes started to fray after 8 years of use so I needed to get a new one and stuck with Chums. I love the newer mechanism for keeping it tight on my head. The original one worked well but this one is even better. I also love the Navy color that I got. I would recommend this for anybody wanting to keep their glasses or in my case loupes on their head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable, and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I, a 23 year old, wear glasses because I personally HATE the thought of putting contacts in my eyes. But I’m constantly pushing my glasses up, or picking them up because they fell off. So I decided to take a stand, I decided I will not be the butt of anyone’s joke anymore! So I taped my glasses to my head, but after losing a few friends and a few patches of hair I realized maybe that wasn’t the best decision. So I bought these and I’ve loved em, sometimes I forget I’m wearing them. It’s so lightweight. Definitely better than tape
customer_reviews.author: JussVibez

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of my sunglasses sliding down my nose whenever I was either running or riding my bike. My Chums solved this problem. They work exactly as advertised - they are extremely soft and comfortable - and the price won't break the bank! Definitely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Serves purpose
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose. The straps are adjustable to tighten or loosen but wish the adjustable plastic piece was a push down spring or drawstring style in order to move it easier as it’s a little difficult to maneuver especially when you’re wearing them to find the right fit
customer_reviews.author: Becksies

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, not so much...functional, absolutely!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, only gave four stars because they aren’t as nice looking as others. So not necessarily stylish but hold extremely well. Easy to put on (I have no idea what other reviews were talking about. I got them on extremely thick pair of glasses and the other stay I purchased went on a normal frame. Both were easy to put on and stayed on well.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Perrigo

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my “normal” frames.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t fit on my glasses - they were too tight. I didn’t my frames were large or anything - just standard. They appear to be nicely made - just didn’t work for me. Too much trouble to return so I just kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fabric discoloration
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, secure, and lightweight... but being that it’s made of fabric, after a few beach and pool uses the black discolored to a weird and ugly-looking brown-gray. I would suggest going with something that is non-fabric.
customer_reviews.author: wowisthisreallyamazon

customer_reviews.title: Not our best purchase
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed. My son really wanted yellow so we bought these and they were horrible. So difficult to get on glasses and impossible to take off nicely. We asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Roo

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is second one I have used, they work great and last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy80549

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses strap
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable strap, as I like having it over my ears. They are adjustable which is nice and I like the color options. the one down side is the cotton does smell after heavy outdoor use so I would recommend washing the straps often.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Usable
customer_reviews.text: this is a pretty product. Its soft. It just gets wet with sweat and it gets super dirty super quick. Its pretty long compared to the other lanyard I have for my other sunglasses and its slightly annoying. Just bulkier all around compared to my silicone one. Nor a bad product just not my personal favorite. I could see it being good for others though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Doucet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Sturdy, lightweight and has been great doing outdoor activities during quarantine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have my glasses around my neck all day now and my glasses don't fall out of my pocket all the time. It's great when you're shopping at Walmart and need to use your glasses often to check prices. Nice and snug and holds the glasses very good.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a musician
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend, he plays guitar in a band and I noticed that his glasses would always slide down his face during shows and he'd have to stop playing for a half-second to adjust them. So I bought him this to wear during concerts. The first time he wore it he fell in love with it. He loved the fun colors and the fact that it was adjustable and made of soft cotton so it didn't hurt his head. However, that was the only time he wore it, because then he lost it. I definitely plan to buy him another one--hopefully he is able to keep up with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Been messing around with a number of different retainers and straps for sunglasses. These are reasonable, comfortable and hold the frames very well, literally everything you are looking for in this kind of item. I trust them to my $350 pair of Maui Jim's and the best I have found, love them!
customer_reviews.author: John S. CO

customer_reviews.title: They simply didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Some of the negative reviews said they were only good for glasses with thin frames . . . like mine. But they don't stay on at all; they slide right off. Useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Petronella

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality; looks like it will stand up to the constant use I subject these to with my cheaters. Nice color; a little less "bright" than the picture (at least on my monitor). I have not used it in a water environment, so I can't speak to the dye bleeding. However, the cotton is good quality so I kind of doubt they will bleed turquoise on your neck - but that's just a guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very secure
customer_reviews.text: These worked really good for my husband. Just be careful if your glasses/sunglasses have little rubber eartabs on the ends, this is so snug, it can remove the rubber tabs. No biggie though, better too tight than too loose I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jones

customer_reviews.title: WE haven't lost our Maui Jims in years
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used these for years, can't misplace your glasses . Comfortable , last couple years with washing always get new pair after they fade out, the price well worth it. Not misplacing glasses really worth it. Good for fishing shopping etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Design. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Just right fit for my prescription glasses. My glasses were constantly slipping off my face, while at work. These do a good job of holding them on. To the other commentators, suggesting their too snug to slide onto frames. I suggest you squeeze the ends, before sliding them over your frames. They seem to be designed similar to a Chinese finger-trap.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting them to fit on prescription glasses.
customer_reviews.text: not sure what type of glasses these were designed for, but they do not fit on any of my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits tight! Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I had an old be that was the same brand and it was far worn out. This is a perfect replacement and it fits so tight it’s PERFECT. Should have ordered a long time ago and next time I need another glasses holder, I will order the same one without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying these unless the tips of arms of your glasses are narrow. I bought these on the basis of how popular they are only to find out that they wouldn't slide over the tips of the arms of my glasses. Unfortunately I never got to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Super ManTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for not misplacing your glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use it all the time. I wear glasses for distance, always taken them off for reading and misplacing them. Not anymore; they just hang down my neck. You can also change the length.
customer_reviews.author: miriam clarke

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: They are adjustable and comfy. You can tighten them down if needed or just keep them lose. I can take them on and off without any problem as well, and when they are on I am not worried that i am going to lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one each for sun and vision glasses, and I love them. They make things so much easier when I have to remove them, and they make it very hard to lose them. Also they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DavidM

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your COVID-19 mask on securely and comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased these to use on a facemask because the elastic was either too loose or too tight. All I had to do was just sew two pairs of these on to the sides of my masks and now the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Item color of American flag is dark, not as bright as advertised and worn out. It smells like tobacco. I suspect the item was used or old stock sitting on counter for a long time. I am not happy with the purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Soft and hang without annoying rubbing. Don’t even know they are there. They attach right to the ends of the arms and don’t Impede on the ears. They also don’t come off like others do.
customer_reviews.author: Zenman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Tried putting it on my sunglasses, was able to get one side on just fine. the other side wouldn't fit on for whatever reason and then the fabric started stretching and ripping. how is one side fine but then the other not. terrible product wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: It fits my sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: Like one other reviewer stated. one side was more difficult to put on than the other. Once I got the end of the ear piece about a quarter inch in it moved on easily. The grip is secure and the retainer is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Uri

customer_reviews.title: Chums user for 40 years
customer_reviews.text: Every time I drift from the Chums style I always return. They strongly adhere to your glasses. They're soft around your neck. They're easily adjusted. Washable. And they last forever. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in the Rockies

customer_reviews.title: Functional and practical design
customer_reviews.text: Seems good so far! Working outside in this heat really makes my glasses slip off my face so this helps a lot. I like the cloth material but will most likely be washing it every once and a while which is fine with me. Kind of looks like I have a rat tail now haha
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great for when you don’t want to wear your sunglasses on your face and just need them to hang down from Your neck. Comfortable and they tighten down well enough when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, comfortable, works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find this! finally something that keeps glasses in place! Also like how it's cotton, easy to wash and air dry! Good quality, it just works, thanks for making a great product, and yes, it's made here in the US!
customer_reviews.author: reviewer9090

customer_reviews.title: Work Great No Mishaps
customer_reviews.text: So Tired of trying to find these that work and don't make my glasses fall hard on the ground, These have worked perfectly, using a lot, and not one mishap are working GREAT !!
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a great option.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my glasses secured during days of backwoods hunting and boating adventures. Cinched securely for a large head size. Can get soaked, but dried quickly in the Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great hold, but gets soggy when sweats
customer_reviews.text: My son wears glasses and he is very active. He plays basketball, football, also does TaeKwonDo. So he's been wanting one of these and this one holds and works great! The one negative part is that because it's made out of cotton, it soaks all the sweats, so it gets nasty when he sweats with these on. But other than that, it's holding the glasses great!
customer_reviews.author: Ki

product_meta.title: Chums Original Cotton Standard End Eyewear Retainer
product_meta.description: With comfortable cotton construction, easily adjustable length, and compatibility with most standard frames, the Chums Original Retainer is the classic solution for eyewear that just doesn't hang on during extreme sports. PRODUCT FEATURES: Usable length: 25" Weight without packaging: 0.4 oz. Assorted Color will be chosen at random
